title: La ilaha illah Allah...or Ashhadu anna la ilaha illah Allah? (Final Answer!!) - Assim al hakeem
transcript: I guess shares my personal on the statement word by word technically is this is a Hadith or this is a general statement okay I I apologize for not doing this anymore because we had like 10 callers before and I've answered this question gazillion times it is a waste of time this is a nonsense so with all due respect I'm not gonna address this go to my YouTube channel you'll find many answers addressing it
